remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit class substitution, deduction form.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Dec-2014.)
statement:
sbcied2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
sbcied2.2 $e |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
sbcied2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = B ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
sbcied2 $p |- ( ph -> ( [. A / x ]. ps <-> ch ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x $.
